PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Full Guide: https://youtu.be/4DyqmI5-RxU Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/EsoroGuides
Build Updates:
NEW 3.13 CHANGES: - Deadeye was unfortunately nerfed specifically for this build. The 10% more damage with projectiles hits per remaining chain line was removed. - Half of this modifier was now added to Cobra Lash mitigating some of the loss. However losing 45% more damage is a massive loss but through the many changes listed below all of the damage has been regained! - Running a new DIVERGENT COBRA LASH will grant access to Projectiles deal 15% increased Damage for each remaining Chain! An extremely strong addition to the build. Be sure to prioritize this upgrade! - Some of Deadeyes new changes will help mitigate that loss. Focal Point has now been picked up! - Our projectiles can now chain off of terrain! This should heavily improve clear speed in many circumstances. - Our marks are now much more powerful. - Far Shot was buffed heavily for this build, helping mitigate even more of the damage loss. - Large changes were made to the core skill tree, optimizing both damage output and energy shield. - Multiple gem setups were swapped around and optimized! - Frost Shield was added for additional defense!
OLD CHANGES:
Heist Changes: Build is looking even better off this league. No major changes and Cobra Lash has a powerful alternate quality version. - Curses are being split up into Hexes and Marks. Hexes are able to apply to many enemies at once and marks can only apply to a single enemy. I recommend still running an Assassin's Mark ring to dramatically improve our single target damage.
Main Harvest Changes: - Cluster jewels have given this build access to incredibly powerful nodes. Stacking Follow Through for a massive damage increase.
Tree Changes: - A full cluster jewel tree has been added.
Gear Changes: - Shaper's Touch has been swapped out for some rare gloves. - Drop Dying Sun if you're running a fully optimized Cluster Tree with at least Fan of Blades x2.
Other Notes: If you have any issues getting stunned consider adding some of the following to the build. - Switch the major Pantheon over to Soul of the Brine King. Capturing all of the additional souls will also help with chill, freeze and stun recovery. This is one of the best and easiest solutions. - A chance to avoid being stunned variation or Cinderswallow flask. - Spend two passive points to pick up Heart of Oak. - Pick up the boot enchantment "80% chance to avoid being stunned if you've killed recently".
